subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gerald Wallace had 36 points and 14 rebounds, and Jason Richardson hit a 3-pointer and four free throws in the final minute to help the Charlotte Bobcats stun the visiting Orlando Magic, 99-93, on Wednesday night.
snippet: Gerald Wallace had 36 points and 14 rebounds, and Jason Richardson hit a 3-pointer and four free throws in the final minute to help the Charlotte Bobcats stun the visiting Orlando Magic, 99-93, on Wednesday night.
